description:
Aihara Mizuho was a genius university student, working for Kurusugawa Electronics and creator of the emotion software for their android prototype HMX-11 a.k.a. http://anidb.net/ch17067 [Feel].
Mizuho appears only in a flashback scene; she died in a car accident years ago, leaving behind her heartbroken lover http://anidb.net/ch17068 [Nagase Yuusuke], and causing the HMX-11 project to be discontinued.
name: Aihara Mizuho
